waiting_query:
UPDATE UserAccount
                         SET
                         Balance =Balance-1,
                         LastUpdateTime= NOW()
                         WHERE UserId='1' and Balance-1>0
                         limit 1

UPDATE UserAccount
                         SET
                         Balance =Balance-1,
                         LastUpdateTime= NOW()
                         WHERE UserId=1 and Balance-1>0
                         limit 1
